senses.de: To keep in good condition or working order
senses.ex: He maintains his car by getting regular check-ups.

Tips.title: Regular Use
Tips.description: Used for objects or skills you want to keep in good shape by using them regularly.
Tips.example: She maintains her language skills by practicing daily.

Tips.title: Routine Care
Tips.description: Often involves routine activities that prevent damage or deterioration over time.
Tips.example: To maintain his bicycle, Tom oils the chain every month.

senses.de: To continue to have something; to keep a particular quality
senses.ex: He maintains a strong relationship with his family.

Tips.title: Steady Effort
Tips.description: Keeping something requires constant effort, it doesn't happen automatically.
Tips.example: Lila studies every evening to maintain her high grades.

senses.de: To assert or uphold something as true, especially in an argument
senses.ex: She maintains her innocence despite the evidence against her.

Tips.title: Firm Assertion
Tips.description: Expressing a strong belief or stance, even when challenged.
Tips.example: Despite the skeptics, he maintains that the project will succeed.

senses.de: To provide with necessities for life or existence
senses.ex: It's difficult to maintain a large family on a small income.

Tips.title: Financial Struggle
Tips.description: It suggests difficulty in providing for basic needs due to limited resources.
Tips.example: She managed to maintain her family on a limited budget.

senses.de: To keep a facility or system operating
senses.ex: The company maintains a large network of servers.

Tips.title: Operational State
Tips.description: Refers to keeping equipment or systems functional and efficient.
Tips.example: Technicians work around the clock to maintain the power grid.

senses.de: To keep a public road or a railroad
senses.ex: The city maintains the roads and other public infrastructure.

Tips.title: Public Responsibility
Tips.description: Indicates a shared duty to keep communal spaces or services in good condition.
Tips.example: The council voted to maintain the park with new facilities.

Conserve.wordDefinition:
Conserve means to protect something from harm, damage or destruction so that it can be preserved for future use. For example, conserving energy means using it wisely and making sure that resources are not wasted.

So, while conserving focuses on protecting and preserving something for the future, maintaining focuses on keeping something in good condition for the present.

Both terms are applicable in different contexts- conserve in environmental or resource management situations, and maintain in personal or organizational situations like car maintenance or building upkeep.

Continue.wordDefinition:
Continue refers to continuing an action or state that has already started. For example, if you're reading a book and you say "I'll continue reading after dinner," this means you'll pick up where you left off and keep reading.

Both words are applicable in different contexts. Continue is useful when talking about ongoing activities, while maintain is useful when talking about keeping something in a certain state or condition over time.

Keep up.wordDefinition:
The words keep up and maintain are similar but have slight differences. Keep up means to continue doing something at the same level or pace, without decreasing.

For example, you might say "I need to keep up my exercise routine" - meaning you need to continue exercising regularly and not let it slip.

Maintain means to keep something in its current state, to prevent it from deteriorating or changing. For example, you might say "I need to maintain my car" - meaning you need to take care of it, get it serviced regularly, make necessary repairs, etc., in order to keep it running well.

Keep up is used for activities or actions that you want to continue doing without losing momentum, while maintain is used for objects or things that you want to keep in good condition or prevent from deteriorating.

Manage.wordDefinition:
Manage means to control or direct the resources, people or activities related to a particular task, project or enterprise.

It often involves decision-making and organizing resources to achieve specific goals. For example, managing a team of workers involves assigning tasks, setting goals, monitoring progress, and making decisions to ensure that the project or task is completed successfully.

In summary, maintaining is about preserving something while managing is about directing or controlling something to achieve a specific outcome.

Preserve.wordDefinition:
Preserve means to protect something from harm or decay, to keep it as it is without changing its original state or condition.

For example, we preserve our family photos, art, or artifacts to keep them safe for future generations to appreciate. We use the term preserve when we desire to conserve something as it is or to make it last a very long time.

Retain.wordDefinition:
Retain means to keep something that you already have or that already exists. For example, you might retain a lawyer to help you with a legal issue.

Maintain is used when you want to keep something the same, while retain is used when you want to keep something that you already have.

Support.wordDefinition:
Maintain means to keep something in good condition, while support means to help someone or something achieve an objective.

For example, you maintain your health by exercising and eating healthy, while you support a friend by encouraging them and helping them through tough times.

In terms of technology, you maintain a computer by cleaning it and updating software, while you support a user by answering questions and offering technical assistance.

Maintain refers to keeping something in good condition, while support refers to helping someone or something achieve a goal.

Sustain.wordDefinition:
Sustain means to keep something going or to support something. For example, you sustain an argument by presenting evidence or you sustain a plant by watering it.

Maintain refers to preserving something that already exists while sustain refers to supporting something in order to keep it going.

Both words can be applied in many different contexts, such as maintaining relationships or sustaining the environment.

Uphold.wordDefinition:
Uphold means to support, defend or adhere to something, often a set of moral principles or beliefs. For example, you uphold the laws of your country by obeying them.

You uphold justice by supporting fairness and equality for all people.

So, in short, maintain is used for keeping something in good condition, while uphold is used for supporting a belief or set of principles.

quotes.Text: At Facebook, we build tools to help people connect with the people they want and share what they want, and by doing this we are extending people's capacity to build and maintain relationships.
quotes.Title: American Businessman
quotes.Name: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.Text: I like to maintain a certain sense of fantasy in my life. I am kind of like that at home. Do I have the full hair and makeup? No. But I might have the nice dress on.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.Text: Next in importance to freedom and justice is popular education, without which neither freedom nor justice can be permanently maintained.
quotes.Title: American President
quotes.Name: James A. Garfield

quotes.Text: I maintain that, if everyone knew what others said about him, there would not be four friends in the world.
quotes.Title: French Philosopher
quotes.Name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.Text: Each director maintains a different personality. Either you get along, or you don't.
quotes.Title: British Actor
quotes.Name: Jason Statham

quotes.Text: I think it is important to maintain your personality, your roots, very important.
quotes.Title: Spanish Actress
quotes.Name: Paz Vega

quotes.Text: I have tried to maintain the variety in the characters I choose to play.
quotes.Title: Indian Actress
quotes.Name: Neha Sharma

quotes.Text: I do maintain that if your hair is wrong, your entire life is wrong.
quotes.Title: English Musician
quotes.Name: Morrissey

quotes.Text: Food is an important element of maintaining a fitter body.
quotes.Title: Indian Actress
quotes.Name: Rashami Desai

quotes.Text: Maintaining my dignity is so important for me.
quotes.Title: Canadian Journalist
quotes.Name: Amanda Lindhout
